title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8010.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8010.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the responsibility and intent of the Board of Parole
to fully implement the provisions of article 26-A of the Correction Law
relating to shock incarceration to the extent that those provisions relate to
the operation of the board and Department of Corrections and Community

Supervision. The provisions of this Part will structure the board's and
department's policies in relation to this program, designed to afford certain
relatively young, nonviolent offenders an opportunity to learn self-discipline
and control. Notes

York State Register December 9, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 49, eff. 12/9/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
